title: cswh
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020074354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Technical Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020074354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Technical%20Info) : cswh**

'cswh' is an [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020074354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) [feature tag](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020074354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/feature%20tag) with the friendly name "Contextual Swash". [Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020074354/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features_ae.htm#cswh) to read the spec from the Microsoft Layout Tag Registry.

**Discussion:**  
 [Contextual Swashes for Beginnings](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020074354/http:/typophile.com/node/19839)  
 [OpenType Scripts, Swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020074354/http:/typophile.com/node/34776)
author: paul d hunt
